rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Since it was first discovered in birds in 1996, H5N1 has shown itself to be a Swiss Army Knife of a virus, evolving the necessary tools to break into the cells of a growing list of species. So far, it has infected and killed millions of wild and farmed birds.

rationale: The segment uses factual language without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
